articles.title: Scientists Describe Shiniest Exoplanet: "Giant Mirror In Space" - NDTV
articles.description: Observations on the exoplanet were carried out by European Space Agency's Cheops (Characterising Exoplanet Satellite) mission.
articles.content:
Scientists said this is the first time a planet like this has been found so close to its star.
Astronomers have said that a planet located 264 light years from Earth is a "giant mirror in space". Ac… [+2249 chars]

articles.title: ESA - Guiding Aeolus' safe reentry - European Space Agency
articles.description: After exceeding its planned life in orbit, ESA’s Aeolus wind satellite is on its way back to Earth. The satellite is currently falling around 1 km a day, and its descent is accelerating. ESA’s spacecraft operators will soon intervene and attempt to guide Aeol…
